resources.string: Printing maps and directions\nrequires a printer which supports\ndouble sided printing
Choose up to 7 contacts to print\non your Paper Phone
Choose the calendars you want\nto print to your Paper Phone
Add a weather report for today
Choose the task lists you want\nto print to your Paper Phone
An empty space will be added to your\nPaper Phone to capture\nthoughts and ideas
Add a screenshot or\npicture to your Paper Phone
Cut marks will be added to\nyour Paper Phone for you\nto store a contactless card
Choose a Paper App to print\nto your Paper Phone
Print maps and directions onto\nthe back of your Paper Phone
Tap to select the things you want\nto print to your Paper Phone

To fold your phone, lay the page map
side up and fold it in half so the two
 little circles at the bottom of the page
touch

Then fold in half again so the squares
are touching

Then fold in half one last time

If you would like to keep a contactless card
inside your Paper Phone then please carefully
cut along the dotted diagonal lines.
Please choose the Google\naccount you wish to use

This experiment prints a
little paper phone with the
most important information
you'll need for the day

Just choose the information
you would like to include on
your Paper Phone and
 hit print
A printable Paper Phone which\nhelps you take a break away\nfrom your digital world
If you would like to include calendar entries on your Paper Phone you will need to allow this app to access your calendar.
If you would like to include contacts entries on your Paper Phone you will need to allow this app to access your contacts.
In order to include directions on your Paper Phone you will need to allow this app to access your location.
In order to include screenshots and photos on your Paper Phone you will need to allow this app to access the pictures on your device.

%s

You can do this in the settings.

Would you like to do this now?
